Contact Us

Our spacious, modern and well-equipped offices are conveniently situated at Suite 208, Second Floor, Sham Peng Tong Plaza, Albert Street, Victoria, with easy access to shops, taxis, banks and the local fresh produce market.

Our customers are important to us, and we therefore believe that we should be accessible to our clients in order to suit their respective working hours. Whether you are in Brazil or Barcelona, South Africa or the South of France, we are always at your service.

Licensed Under The International Corporate Service Providers Act, 2003
